Plot: In the Antarctic, every March since the beginning of time, the quest begins to find the perfect mate and start a family.
Title: March of the Penguins
Writer: Luc Jacquet (scenario), Luc Jacquet (adaptation), Michel Fessler (adaptation), Jordan Roberts (narration: US edited version)
Actors: Charles Berling, Romane Bohringer, Jules Sitruk, Morgan Freeman
tomatoConsensus: Only the most hardened soul won't be moved by this heartwarming doc.
